other_tests.findings: Appendix is diffusely dilated up to 1.0 cm in diameter and contains multiple fecaliths. Adjacent fat stranding secondary to inflammatory changes is noted. Moderate sliding-type hiatal hernia noted. Liver is diffusely fatty but without focal abnormality. No evidence of biliary dilatation. Kidneys enhance symmetrically without suspicious solid mass. No retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy.
